column4: Hi all.  The only thing that's keeping me from switching from Windoze completely is that dling from Usenet (with hellanzb and Klibido) is much, much slower than in Windoze.  But running a speed test in firefox gives same reading regardless of OS.
Have you tried disabling ipv6? It can cause some speed issues.
my hardware is quite new and IPv6 is enabled in Windows with no speed reduction and my web browsing isn't slow.  Only usenet binaries downloading.
Sorry. I don't use usenet and don't really know what could be causing that issue then.
